meanings.definition: Occurring through divine or supernatural intervention
meanings.sent1: The villagers witnessed a miraculous event when the sun suddenly turned red.
meanings.sent2: The doctor's ability to save the patient's life was truly miraculous.
meanings.sent3: It was miraculous how the cat managed to open the door by itself.
meanings.sent4: The growth of the tiny seed into a towering tree was a miraculous transformation.
meanings.sent5: The magician's performance was so miraculous that the audience gasped in awe.

meanings.sent1: The artist created a miraculous painting that left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent2: The team's comeback in the game was nothing short of miraculous.
meanings.sent3: The chef's ability to cook multiple dishes at once was truly miraculous.
meanings.sent4: The sunset over the ocean was a miraculous display of colors.
meanings.sent5: The student's improvement in math was as miraculous as it was unexpected.
